title: Best of the Program | Guest: Carol Roth | 8/3/22
description:
The U.K. is shutting down the sole children's gender clinic and rejecting the idea of gender-affirming care, highlighting America's extremism. Glenn reviews the latest op-ed from everybody’s favorite election meddler, George Soros. Former investment banker Carol Roth joins to critique President Biden for asking for $80 billion in extra IRS funding to crack down on tax evasion.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
